title: Brick-by-Brick
description: A prototype for a website designed for LEGO collectors to catalogue and share their collections with the world. Designed in Figma, and built with HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript.

title: George's Garden Center
description: This project, completed at North Metropolitan TAFE, involved designing, prototyping and building a responsive website for a fictitious client using Figma and Bootstrap 5.

title: Grad-Show Project
description: A project currently in development at North Metropolitan TAFE. A website built with WordPress, showcasing the work of graduating students in Semester 1 of 2023.
